function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential exposure to COVID-19 due to increased time spent at home","Impact":"Increased risk of contracting COVID-19","Mitigation":"Encourage vaccination, promote indoor ventilation, and maintain social distancing","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, and monitoring devices","People":"Participants and their families","Owner":"Health authorities and building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate balcony spaces considered insufficient for use","Impact":"Discomfort and dissatisfaction with living environment","Mitigation":"Renovation or expansion of balcony spaces, installation of features for comfort and usability","Technologies":"Architectural design software, construction materials, and ergonomic furniture","People":"Residents of the building","Owner":"Building management and owners"},{"Description":"Increased preference for staying at home due to COVID-19 concerns","Impact":"Reduced engagement in outdoor activities and limited social interaction","Mitigation":"Promote safe outdoor activities, facilitate virtual social connections, and provide mental health support","Technologies":"Virtual communication platforms, mental health apps, and community engagement tools","People":"Participants and their families","Owner":"Community organizations and health authorities"}]}
